name: Hidden Object: Mysterious Person
description:
You have to look for hidden objects in the levels.
This game is suitable for all ages

Choose different mode Picture mode, Shape mode, Word Mode

In this game you have to look for hidden objects in various locations, mitstichnosti and full of mystery.
You have to find ten objects that hidden on the pictures or shape and word. To pass each level, you must find all the hidden objects. If you need assistance, use the hint.
